titles.title: To direct the Secretary of the Interior to reissue a final rule relating to removing the Greater Yellowstone Ecosystem population of grizzly bears from the Federal list of endangered and threatened wildlife.
Grizzly Bear State Management Act of 2019
Grizzly Bear State Management Act of 2019
Grizzly Bear State Management Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water, Oceans, and Wildlife.

bill.summary:
Grizzly Bear State Management Act of 2019
This bill requires the Department of the Interior to remove the Greater Yellowstone ecosystem population of grizzly bears from the list of endangered and threatened wildlife.
